showerReviews.reviewText: clean, nice, and well-run community center in the heart of Raleigh

Went to a baby shower at this community center and it was perfect. The area was quiet for our event and plenty of parking. The front desk guy was super nice to all of the attendees and helped us with finding the bathroom and other things we needed.

Very large, clean, and modern. Always very accommodating during open volleyball and the people who work at the desk are super friendly. I enjoy playing here a lot! The gym also looks very nice, although I’ve never used it.

We mainly go here for the Raleigh Parks & Rec Preschool Nature Programs held once a month. It is also a gym, and has rooms for other activities as well.
